commit message:
Add new intent to 'Play on Kodi'. This allows sharing videos from the YouTube app to Kodi (unfortunately the share option will appear in every app that shares plain text links, as that is what the YouTube app shares).
Tweaked the Now Playing and Playlist screens to better support YouTube videos
Changed HostConnectionObserver to notify clients not only when the id of what's playing changes but also when the label changes (YouTube videos and pictures for instance don't have ids, so the remote wasn't getting notified of a change in what's playing)

Change share intent behaviour: if a video is already playing, queue the shared file, otherwise start playing it immediately.
Defined playlist types in the correct place

Allow the user to specify the protocol to use in the connection (TCP/HTTP). HTTP is always needed/used (for images and some requests where TCP can't be used because we want to be stateless), TCP is used by default and if available, but now the user can explicitly choose not to use TCP and always go through HTTP.
Fix Null pointer exception reported on Google Play
Fix string translation that was causing an Exception
Fixed exception reported on Google Play (not sure how to trigger it, but this can't hurt)
Catch invalid format exception for WoL port (host manual configuration)
Possible fix for an exception reported on Google Play (can't reproduce...)
Fix runtime exception reported on Google Play
Fix exception reported on Google Play
Increse popup menu icon size in playlist and files list
Improve display of long titles on playlist and files list
Don't display year when it's 0
Fix ClassCastException on Files.GetDirectory (this can be in other places)

Switched HTTP library. Using OkHttp explicitly now, instead of the default Android one, which varies acroos OS versions.
OkHttp is also used as the backend for loading images (Picasso).
Added disk cache to image loading.
Update library versions: jackson, butterknife, eventbus and floatingactionbutton
Add option to play youtube URLs on Kodi
Fix some log messages
Update german translation
Disable http keep-alive if we get a ProtocolException (bad status line) from the server.

Merge pull request #71 from jonas2515/master

Update german translation
Fix warning on compilation
Updated Portuguese translations
Bump version for release
